definition: various notes or records/a miscellany/scattered jottings
mixed/miscellaneous/various/to mix

sentences.english: The inscriptive writings are attaches after the certain carrier the short nimble miscellany prose.
sentences.chinese: “題跋”是附於一定載體之後的短小靈活的雜記散文。

sentences.english: The author has investigated systematically the different versions of "Miscellanies at Banqiao" and their circulation.
sentences.chinese: 本文系統考察了《板橋雜記》的各種刊本與流傳過程。

sentences.english: Shall we go to watch an acrobatic show?
sentences.chinese: 我們去觀看雜記表演，好嗎？

sentences.english: In his Miscellanies, the ideal was the attainment of uninterrupted communion with God.
sentences.chinese: 在他的雜記，理想是實現不間斷地與上帝。
